Articles.Content: @JadeOfMaarThe mod dint work instead it showed some gray stuff to the left of the KSC and when i removed Toolbar controller the mod worked perfectlly fine.

On 10/7/2021 at 7:19 AM, JadeOfMaar said:

If you can, re-add mods until you get the problem again. I'm curious to which mod is the offender.

I have gotten the same problem but i fixed it by removing Toolbarcontroller. (re upload of the post i made before cause i forgot to quote)

54 minutes ago, mike19542 said:

I have gotten the same problem but i fixed it by removing Toolbarcontroller. (re upload of the post i made before cause i forgot to quote)

Things that make you go "hmmm."  So, not doubting what you're saying here, but I can say for sure that ToolbarController is not a direct conflict with this mod, as I have both. TBC is required by soooo many other mods, you probably want it, too. If removing it fixed something with this mod, then there must be some cascading issue that resulted in a fix, but removing TBC shouldn't *be* the actual fix. 

When you had TBC, did you also have ClickThroughBlocker? If you didn't, then that will cause untold havok. Or worse

11 hours ago, OrbitalManeuvers said:

TBC is required by soooo many other mods, you probably want it, too. If removing it fixed something with this mod, then there must be some cascading issue that resulted in a fix, but removing TBC shouldn't *be* the actual fix. 

When you had TBC, did you also have ClickThroughBlocker? If you didn't, then that will cause untold havok. Or worse  

First added both CTB and toolbar controller then i removed CTB and the issue was still there. Removed toolbar controller and..... well.... the mod worked
i give up on this

Hello, I'm not quite sure if this is a Kerbal Konstructs problem or a KSC extended problem, but since Kerbal Konstructs is showing up ingame, I'm going to assume the problem stems from here.

So I've been attempting to get KSC extended working in my 1.12.3 JNSQ install but to no avail. Kerbal Konstructs shows up in-game, but no statics ever appear. I was wondering what I could do to fix this?

EngineLightRelit seems to be missing its dependencies Toolbar Controller and Click Through Blocker resulting in multiple assembly load exceptions throughout the log. KSP assembly loader is notoriously fragile with one failing assembly often causing other unrelated assemblies to also fail to load correctly.

Edit:

Also B9 Part Switch is using an old version. Upgrade to v2.20.0

Edited May 3, 2022 by Aelfhe1m

16 hours ago, Aelfhe1m said:

EngineLightRelit seems to be missing its dependencies Toolbar Controller and Click Through Blocker resulting in multiple assembly load exceptions throughout the log. KSP assembly loader is notoriously fragile with one failing assembly often causing other unrelated assemblies to also fail to load correctly.

Edit:

Also B9 Part Switch is using an old version. Upgrade to v2.20.0

I did that and an issue I had with TextureReplacer is now working, but Kerbal Konstructs still doesn't seem to be working.

Edit: The regular JNSQ launchsites are all working, it's just KSC extended that doesn't show up.

Edited May 3, 2022 by Misguided Kerbal

Welp, after deleting the MM cache everything is showing up turns out i forgot to install the KSC extended folder 

Thanks for your help!
maybe it will sound strange but is it possible to change the color of the ground in jnsq?

Hi, love the look of this mod.

How does it work with career mode?

Will everything be unlocked and built straight away?

Is it even compatible or potentially game breaking, particularly mid-career?

 

Thanks!

Tommo

1 hour ago, Tommo2400 said:

Hi, love the look of this mod.

How does it work with career mode?

Will everything be unlocked and built straight away?

Is it even compatible or potentially game breaking, particularly mid-career?

 

Thanks!

Tommo

This mod is mostly cosmetic and doesn't interact with career (or cause any problems). All the extra buildings pads, roadways etc. will show up immediately. The stock buildings upgrade normally. Adding it mid-save shouldn't cause any problems but it's good practice to backup your save before adding new mods.

I think, I found three minor issues:

The horizontal test pad has a glowing blue circle clipping through the ground. Sometimes it flickers. I am not on my PC, so can't send pics of it.

 

The TSC-Runways are named 09 and 27, but the runway is not aligned 90 degree and 270 degree.

 

And the Launchpads 39A and B are named TSC but do not belong to the TSC. The other KSC Launchpads are named TLC.
Is there a version of this at all that includes all the custom launch sites in the same area ?
Will it be compatible with Parallax?
As far as I know it's fully compatible. I'm running them together and haven't had any problems.

I have a weird issue. When I select a launchpad, additional options that come with this mod disappear after a few seconds, and I'm left with stock options.

Edited August 7, 2022 by mazer924
Can I use this with jnsq?
